1501710.name: Ho-Ho-Home Invasion: Support The Devs - Gingerbread Cookies
1501710.description:
Support The Developers - Gingerbread Cookies Tier.

IMPORTANT: DLC contains no additional content.


DLC for Ho-Ho-Home Invasion is equivalent to different suggested tiers of support, in accordance with a "pay-what-you-liked" model. It allows you to support the developers, at whichever price you prefer, after having experienced the game's contents.

None of the game's content is locked, and purchasing DLC will not unlock any additional features or content related to the game. Purchasing this DLC is only and expressly meant to support the game and Whitepot Studios. Thanks for your support!
